com.atc.simulator.display.model

Class Display.DelayedCameraListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.flightdata.delayed_work.DelayedWorkQueueItemType
      • com.atc.simulator.display.model.Display.DelayedCameraListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayCameraListener
    Enclosing class:
    Display

    private class Display.DelayedCameraListener
extends DelayedWorkQueueItemType
implements DisplayCameraListener
    A DelayedWorkQueueItemType which implements display camera listener in order to be able to put updates to models due to changes to the camera into the DelayedWorker's queue so that it can be processed gradually rather than bogging down the framerate and doing an update each time the camera changes (which while zooming could be once every frame).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.atc.simulator.display.DisplayCameraListener

        DisplayCameraListener.CameraUpdate, DisplayCameraListener.UpdateType
